title: The Mer Prince
description: Zachariah is handsome and different. He pays attention to Gabriella when no other guys do. He stands up for her when her 'friends' decide to leave her. But he has a secret. He also has a guard, Preston. Preston is just as strong and handsome as Zach but he's not the friendliest. It takes him time to warm up to people. What are the two guys hiding and why does Zach have such a fascination with the shy and quiet Gabriella.When Zach finally reveals his secrets will Gabriella accept or reject him? Does Gabriella have secrets that she doesn't even know of?
author: Lindsey Owens
